help-file.title: MERCENARY
help-file.content:
Privateers who roam the land in a fashion similar to smugglers and thieves, Mercenaries are a cross between a rogue and a Warrior and have some of the skills of each. This class is known for its anti-social behavior and they tend to be extremely selfish by nature. However, everything has its price and they are soldiers for hire. Mercenaries typically possess more hit points than the waspish rogues, but are not quite as brawny as Warriors. >From long battle experience, they are more likely to hit their opponents than either Thieves or Assassins.
Allowable races: Human, Barbarian, Mountain Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Duergar Dwarf, Troll, Orc, Goblin, Shadow Beast, Minotaur, Shade, Revenant, Vampire, Death Knight. Innate abilities: No class-specific innate abilities. Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, Mercenaries have their own classification of item restriction. They can use quite a variety of weapons but are generally more limited in their selection of armor. They are moderately limited in their usage of miscellaneous magical items such as wands, etc.
